introduction: John SurteesFull nameJohn Norman SurteesDate of birth11 February 1934(1934-02-11)Date of death10 March 2017(2017-03-10) (aged83)OccupationTeam ownerEmployerSurteesYears active1970  1978John Norman Surtees CBE (born 11th February 1934, Tatsfield, Surrey  died 10th March 2017) was a former Grand Prix Motorcycling racer and Formula One driver.  Surtees won the F1 World Championship in 1964, in just his fourth full season of the sport, and is the only person to win World Championships on both two and four wheels.
